mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_CST_REPORT_DICT( REPORT_NAME, REPORT_DESC, OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{reportName}, #{reportDesc}, #{operator}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, REPORT_NAME as reportName, REPORT_DESC as reportDesc, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_CST_REPORT_DICT WHERE ID=#{id}
